title: Nothing interesting has ever happened in my life. It’s to the point that the most interesting thing about me is lack of any interesting and so my life has become boring, how do I make it interesting? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Depends what age you are but the best thing in my opinion for broadening life experience is travel. Not as a tourist but as an explorer. That means you don’t just go to see the sights but go to LIVE and engage with the culture. Learn the language, make friends, share your language and culture and reinvent yourself. It will change your outlook to everything - your home country, your cultural assumptions, other people and other ideas. It takes a huge commitment but the rewards are also huge.
